author: Lai Siu Chiu SJ:
casenumber: High Court — Suit No 546 of 2015 (Summons No 1124 of 2016) and Suit No 111 of 2016 (Summonses Nos 554, 754 and 934 of 2016)
casename: Goh Seng Heng v RSP Investments and others and another matter
